website_summaries.verdict: Many commuters will enjoy having a compact bicycle in their trunks for emergency or leisure use. The tire size is ideal for typical road use, and the single gear does not require professional tuning.
pros: Substantial weight capacity for a folding bike

customer_reviews.title: Lots of goods, Lots of bads
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a bike that you are not going to fold and unfold often this may not be it, your back its not going to appreciate this bike bike pros: It rides nice and smooth good looks feels like its going to last a life time bike cons: weights a ton folding mechanism has a learning curve things smash together when folded specially fenders and pedals by the way I also own a citizen bike and that thing its an awesome bike I think amazon should get a deal with these guys
customer_reviews.author: Jose Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Good basic transportation
customer_reviews.text: Received this bike with the drive sprocket bent from shipping. I was going to request a warranty sprocket replacement but the sprocket metal was so soft I was able to straighten it by hand. It is great for having around the campground but being single speed, I would not want to take it on a long ride. It is very convenient to be able to fold so it is easier to transport.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike!
customer_reviews.text: This a nice little single speed bike. It is a great campground cruiser. I bought a couple of them for the wife and I. I throw them in the back of the truck and away we go. I use them to run to the store, ride along lake shores, or just for pleasure. They are well .she and ride great. Assembly involved simply unfolding them and adjusting the brakes. Nice bike!
customer_reviews.author: A Swank

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend for long distances
customer_reviews.text: This bike is very heavy and does not have any gears. I would not recommend for long distances, hilly areas or if you plan to carry during your commute. It is best for a ride through the park or your neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, stable and nice classic design. Just be aware of the weight, it is too heavy to transport it, however it's great for storage. Pieces, breaks, etc are cheap but for this price it is obvious. Another bad thing is that the seat is very hard and unconformable in long distance rides. Other than that a great bike for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Koala

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is pretty heavy for a foldable bike. I struggle a ton when it’s folded and bring it onto a train, so I usually wait to fold it when once I’m boarded but that sometimes gets in the way of other people boarding/loading bikes. My second week I snapped the front brake when I was trying to put the bike together again because the wire always gets caught in the handle. It’s also super clunky when putting it together or taking it apart compared to other foldable bikes. I personally have not had a good experience and would not recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisia Perez

customer_reviews.title: ITEM DEFECTED! NO QUALITY CONTROL!
customer_reviews.text: I received this bicycle today 6/5/19. I was putting the air in the back wheel and everything was alright but then I continued with the front wheel which was defected and let the air out, there was a whole inside the wheel. So I'm returning this item the same day on 6/5/19. I'm glad that Amazon has a returning system. Be aware buying this Schwinn bicycle no quality control, my son was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RYgreg

customer_reviews.title: Shipping and handling is lacking
customer_reviews.text: It's not sturdy because the bike stand is too short the bike has to be leaned up against the wall. Plus I received the bike in a very damaged box with busted parts on the bike. Not very happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bike came preassembled, brakes were off and hit the wheel, also all of the guards made contact with something so I removed them. But pretty easy to fold but a pain to get in the bags
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine. You do have to assemble it but what ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bike even though the reviews were still unknown. It worked fine. You do have to assemble it but what I mean assemble is to snap it together. There are directions. The bike is a bit heavy. But it folded fine and I was able to put it in a hatchback. The only issue I have is that it does not have a latch or I have yet to figure it out when it is folded it stays like that especially when transporting. Otherwise, I was looking for a simple bike to just ride around with. This did the job. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Magana

customer_reviews.title: almost get killed!!!!!!!!!!!!in the middle of the road
customer_reviews.text: I like the bike till I fall down in the middle of the road and got bruises everywhere on my body(the above pic just shows a corner of the iceberg) luckily the car stopped and drivers and pedestrians helped me out. called the customer service and give a $5 back. LOL very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hai

customer_reviews.title: Hold easily but doesn't clip closed
customer_reviews.text: Bike is heavier than anticipated. Not a true "commuters" bike. Hold easily but doesn't clip closed. I wouldn't rec one gear as it was difficult to pedal
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: Check the parts you receive.
customer_reviews.text: I was shipped a different pedal for the right side of the bike, which doesn’t fit in the screw hole correctly and only lasted for two short rides before coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: DarcyAnnie

customer_reviews.title: Useless Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Piece of useless garbage. Either the hinge came in damaged or defect. You cannot join together therefore you cannot use. The manual show a whole different hinge. I feel like I have been ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great bikes they fold well and are compact. Seems to be strong and sturdy I’m 183lbs and my husband is 250lbs. The only thing we wish is the seats were wider, even with a gel slip on wasn’t enough for longer comfortable rides. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Frame was bent
customer_reviews.text: I know that I bought this used but it’s supposed to be examined. Spent an hour trying to hammer out one of the points of contract. Luckily I was able to secure it but at the cost of the look of the bike. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Davina E Emihl

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I live on a sailboat and use this a transportation while in port. It’s easy to operate and very functional. Folds easily. 5*
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great, but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Its great if you’re on flat road. Single gear makes even small hills a chore. Bicycle is very heavy. Upside is it feels super sturdy and great for short distances. Downside is that If you get a flat, this bicycle is less than ideal to carry back home. All in all happy with my purchase but will upgrade to a battery powered one as soon as I am able.
customer_reviews.author: enoch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Bought two for my adult grand daughters. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Bergman

customer_reviews.title: My bike
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this same bike last year and I love it. it folds up very easy and rides great. We take them to the coast in our 5th wheel and ride them all over.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome foldable bike for urban mushing
customer_reviews.text: Great foldable bike for urban mushing with my husky. Great customer service as well and super fast in response.
customer_reviews.author: I love huskies

customer_reviews.title: Small and works well folds easily
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a single speed bike and this folds and fits in our camper. It rides smoothly and allows us to go bike riding together when camping.
customer_reviews.author: Martin L. Carsner

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love mines !! Its just what I wanted.I have a short commute to work and I can sit it in the corner of my office
customer_reviews.author: leon

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: This is good solid bike and a good value if it works right out of the box. Mine has a problem with the front brake. Customer Service is EXCELLENT and they are working me thru the problem. This rating would be 4 stars but for this brake issue. UPDATE: The problem was a front brake pad which was promptly replaced by customer service at no charge and it did fix the problem. Kudos to their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bike. Well worth it for the price. Use it as a commuter, it’s a lifesaver. Folds and unfolds so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived in an I damaged box but the main hinge on the frame was bent and damaged. I managed to get the hinge to close but it has been bent to the point that paint has flaked off due to the warping of the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Works well, needs some tweaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a little bike I could cruise up and down a paved trail on. It works great for this purpose, though I feel like a goofball riding it due to the tiny wheels. Only minor complaint is that mine took some tweaking on the breaks, and the wheels had a slow leak, so I replaced them both for about 16 bucks. Other than that it's been great, and for the price and my needs, a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Vreenak

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, Better price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a second mode of transportation that I could fit in the trunk of my car (a dodge neon). This bike fits like a glove. Than unfolds into an awesome bike. Its great and gets me around campus much quicker so I'm not late for class. :) Plus, I'm a big guy. Six foot four inches tall and 190 pounds. It has a maximum load of 230 pounds. So, it gets me and my junk around in a jiffy! Worth every penny I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie K.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the hinge bolt was very stiff, and needed a punch and hammer to loosen it. This has improved on use. The tires rubbed on the splash guards, and the brake blocks, and the tires did not stay inflated as I would expect. To transport this product, one should tie the wheels together, and also the folded handlebars, before bagging it. The carry bag is a good idea. On flat terrain the bike was excellent for cruising, but the single gear made slopes an effort. Good bike for going to the shops in flatland.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat tire upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Came with a flat tire, had to spend $80 to get it fixed. Spent an extra $50 to make sure the bike was in working order at the bike shop.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to take along and he can ride on his ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who drives cross country. It's easy to take along and he can ride on his down time. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vickous

customer_reviews.title: Great folder for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I ordered two of these folding bikes and are happy with our purchase. The frame and wheels are very sturdy and the tires seem like there good quality. They were shipped very quickly and the only issue we had was that the frame on both seats that came with the bike were bent from packing or shipping where they could not be used. We had to replace them. The wheels spin easily with no wobble, the brakes work fine and the bike seems to ride very well.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC PURCHASE FOR SOMEONE WITH LIMITED STORAGE SPACE!!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PURCHASE! VERY PLEASED, ESPECIALLY WITH EASE OF ASSEMBLY, DO NOT RECOMMEND ORDERING ANY SERVICE FOR ASSEMBLY LOCALLY AS LONG AS YOU HAVE AN ADEPT CHILD OR GRANDCHILD AROUND THE PREMISES OCCASIONALLY.
customer_reviews.author: Murphyworks

customer_reviews.title: Which is not a very fun discovery during a hectic morning commute
customer_reviews.text: It is alright. I used it a couple times to commute on the train, but after a few times the front break cable sheered off. Which is not a very fun discovery during a hectic morning commute, but it does the job, and you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Brenan

customer_reviews.title: Great bike! Recommend for anyone looking for light commuting bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my dad since he likes biking to work sometimes, we don't have much space at home so we decided to get him this folding bike. It holds well even when I ride it and I'm about 200 lbs. It's a light weight bike so it tugs foward every time you pedal which I thought was great response for such a small framed bike, it's not as small as a bmx but it's I the middle. The seat can be adjusted to meet your height
customer_reviews.author: Luis Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike but arrives unrideable.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Bike arrived with bent paddle crank...no QC people?
customer_reviews.author: hwee-leong ang

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: All-around fantastic bike ... worked great for my young son, myself & and my elderly mother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice thought
customer_reviews.text: This bike is a nice thought. It is compact, fairly easy to fold and put away and would be a great ride for someone else. The placement of the pedals is a little weird and makes riding cumbersome and once unfolded the bike feels precarious since nothing feels firmly in place.
customer_reviews.author: The Mom

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for this bike a seriously lacking. Even at the company's website, YouTube anywhere I looked, it just seems this bike lacks clear instructions. Fell like I was riding child's bike, so threw the whole thing in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Samara hilton

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN but only a bit
customer_reviews.text: And by broken, I mean scratched up quite a bit and I could not lock it. The middle clamp was bent so that I could not lock my bike into place. It was disappointing. However, not feeling like sending it back, I took a wrench and smacked it into place. I was able to lock my bike and ride it. It is nice in everyway. You get what you pay for, and let's be honest, this bike is cheap. But I'm not complaining. It works nicely for what I need it for, which is commuting. But it is small. I'm a small girl and I think it's small. Anyway, I'm happy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this bike. He travels and carries it in his truck. A little heavy for a subway/commuter bike but fits his needs perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amie Q.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bike. I'm a truck driver and I carry it with me on my travels. It allows me to get out of the truck stops and visit the towns I stop in. It would be a little heavy if your lugging it on and off a subway and it's only a single speed which means you won't be climbing large hills but it's perfect for tooling around town and seeing the sights.
customer_reviews.author: J Lee

customer_reviews.title: Came in the mail broken.
customer_reviews.text: It was a very easy bike to install, but it was broken. Brakes were underneath the tires in between the spokes which caused the bike to not move.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah K.

customer_reviews.title: I also needed a bike that would fold down for easy storage. This bike was perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: My son is autistic and needed an adult bike without gears that would fit him (he's 15). I also needed a bike that would fold down for easy storage. This bike was perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike. Wish it hand some way of carrying it when folded. Impossible to put it in the case/bag it came with. Overall a good bike.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and not built for long term use. The pedal stripped out the crank threads because the cranks are made of plastic covered in silver. After 3 months the rust has started to become the new color of the bike. Spend the extra cash and find a better quality bike, unless you want a disposable bike.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Tee

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our use.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is just perfect for my husband and I who are using them to get to the subway. Our terrain is totally flat, wich is what you want with this bike since there are no gears. It was super easy to put together, and we are not good at putting things together. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Portable!
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to fold it and take anywhere with me. Geared great as well for all kinds of riding.
customer_reviews.author: fhccbrghbff

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my fiancé as a birthday gift. I drive her to work at 5am every morning and she rides her bike home while I'm at work. We wanted something that would easily fit in my trunk and would not take up a lot of space in our apartment. Although the bike is a little unwieldy when folded and a little heavier than expected, all in all it was a pretty good purchase. No damage during shipping other than the logo rubbed off a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I expected. Folds. Rides nice. Fits in the trunk. Stuff like that. Five more words require. Done.
customer_reviews.author: Jandar

customer_reviews.title: it's ok only ok the dahon uno way better
customer_reviews.text: kind of hard to open and close, and the brakes keep getting stuck. also the seat is tough on your derriere, the dahon uno is a way better product, got them both at the same time
customer_reviews.author: 2n10z

customer_reviews.title: What a great little bike!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bike for my wife to use...after several minutes she mastered the assembly process and immediately went for a bike ride throughout our neighborhood. She loves her new bike!
customer_reviews.author: Big man

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: everything was okay, but the chainring was damaged. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: folding bike
customer_reviews.text: I like the bike, a little heavier than the Dakon but I go for the American name and brand. I have a little car and it fits perfectly in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Joan V. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it could traveling to my home and job just as expected
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike, easy to fold up and fun to ride!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the price. Folds without issue and rides great!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Fonfrias

customer_reviews.title: A fun little traveller
customer_reviews.text: Rides well once the brakes were adjusted and the wheels trued with spoke tightening/loosening.
customer_reviews.author: Triguydoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike, fits in my trunk and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: CTran

customer_reviews.title: this bike is fun to use
customer_reviews.text: this bike is fun to use,easy to fold or unfold whenever,wherever it is needed!. It 's functional and people are attracted to it.
customer_reviews.author: K.Wong

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It is heavier than I thought it would be. Very difficult to carry in the bag as a matter of fact the bottom of the bag tore The first time I used it. The chain guard also broke right away. I would suggest investing more money and buying something better. It's not terrible but not great, I wanted it for travel but will leave it home to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: Great present, my boyfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great present, my boyfriend loves it. There was one piece broken/bent when we got it, but it was quickly replaced
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fold up as well as a Brompton, but at less than 25% of the price it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bikes! Purchased 2 for my wife and I
customer_reviews.text: Great bikes! Purchased 2 for my wife and I. They fold up nicely and seem to be of better quality than some of the other (and cheaper) folding bikes out there. We did buy the schwinn gel seat covers for extra seat comfort, but that is just a personal preference. We ride them about 8 miles 4 times a week. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Dully

customer_reviews.title: A compromise bicycle likely useful to no one
customer_reviews.text: The seat is the most painful I’ve ever found on a bicycle- I’m still waiting for the pain to go away 2 weeks after my only ride. The single gear is bad both on hills or any time you want to go faster than 10 mi/h. The small wheeles make the bike unstable, and the heavy 40 lbs construction makes it both cumbersome and heavy. Very cute bicycle though
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to store in small places, good brand and quality
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: folds easy, a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: got this cuz I live in an apt. folds away easily but is a bit heavy. all in all a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Damage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a folding bicycle and it arrived damaged, so i returned it and had them ship another and it was damaged in the same place, so had to return that one as well. The bike itself seemed to be of good quality but the box it was shipped in was damaged in the exact same spot on both shipments, causing damage to the bike making it unusable. At this time cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: py2012

customer_reviews.title: mini bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is okay. It is sort of lite as I was going over a curve I popped an accidental wheelie. This bike will get the job done of getting me to the train on time and insuring that I have a seat when I get on ( Yay!) .
customer_reviews.author: burnrooter

customer_reviews.title: Scratch on pedal handle aluminum
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to see unless you put on the pedal (as you have to) but there is are scratches on the pedal handle as if someone already took off the handle with a wrench or something and that this is not new.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Stroud

customer_reviews.title: COMPACT.!!
customer_reviews.text: great bike.! i would have given it 5 stars but the seat is way tiny hurt my butt lol good for every day use, easy to fold and put away. loved it.!
customer_reviews.author: felisha

customer_reviews.title: It`s a very good product. Well made and solid
customer_reviews.text: It`s a very good product. Well made and solid. The only con is that it should be sold with some sort of strap or other solution to keep both weels locked together when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Estevam Odebrecht

customer_reviews.title: it weighs to much!
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to ride though. only has one gear and really good brakes. I think it weighs more than a regular bicycle but folds in half taking up much less space.
customer_reviews.author: jmt

customer_reviews.title: nice little cruiser
customer_reviews.text: it won't get you anywhere in a hurry but that's not really the purpose of a cruiser now is it?! in hindsight multiple gears would have been ideal but it's been a nice little ride to and from my neighborhood grocer and gym. Fits nicely all folded up in my basement as well. On the whole not bad Schwinn.
customer_reviews.author: lady elle

customer_reviews.title: It was worth it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my wife needed!!! Takes it on the bus to work, this is a true commuter bicycle that does not cost a lot. Easy to store away in the trunk of a car. Very easy to handle & comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel P. Failla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handles well and I have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Warped chain wheel right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was eager to ride my Schwinn Hinge but when my son arrived to inflate the tires and replace the seat with a more comfortable one, he noted that the chain wheel was warped right out of the box, which made the bike unusable. Whatever happened to quality control? Luckily, UPS can pick the bike up and ship it back to Amazon.com, which is a benefit of buying with them.
customer_reviews.author: Zooming

customer_reviews.title: It is otherwise perfect and I want to keep the bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike reached with a flat front tire. It is otherwise perfect and I want to keep the bike. But don't know whom to contact to get necessary spares for fixing it.
customer_reviews.author: Soumya Panigrahi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Schwinn needs to ship it with better handling. It arrived dented.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this bike to anyone who commutes on the train/subway into or out of the city. sturdy, easy to fold, kind of heavy (about 50 lbs.) but all in all, it's a good useful bike.
customer_reviews.author: Cleatis Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bike, but..
customer_reviews.text: The chainring arrived bent, just bent enough to not hold the chain on. I shouldn't have to pay to fix something that's brand new. So I sent it back. It's a shame because it was a pretty bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Schwinn Hinge Folding Bicycle
customer_reviews.text: This is a dream come true - a perfect bicycle for the casual bicyclist. Fold it, and it fits into your car for instant transportation or recreation at a park or wherever. And --- very affordable!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Paglianti

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, really folds
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in crushed box, but bike was fine. Works like shown, and easy to fold. Rides fine. I had bike repairer check and adjust everything. I MADE A MISTAKE, was going to buy 7 speed but chose wrong. but my bike guy says maybe i did right. I get messed up changing gears. For now will build up my riding abilities til i can ride a geared bike. And i am afraid to ride on streets, so i can drive this where i want to go, cause it folds.
customer_reviews.author: un-used to amazon but happy

customer_reviews.title: the chainring came very warped. makes some noise and ...
customer_reviews.text: the chainring came very warped . makes some noise and had to take the current protection, because otherwise , not walked. the other bike came ok .
customer_reviews.author: Luis Magalhães

customer_reviews.title: too small for me
customer_reviews.text: everything was exactly as described so there are no surprises which is good. however it just wasn't a good fit for me. i really wanted to have a bike I could fold up and put in my trunk. this was hard to fold up and fold back together and it was also incredibly small and hard to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Fan

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I saw is that it is heavier than I expected. But it is very easy to fold and unfold it, it is very comfortable and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Amelia Fracalossi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am using the bike in Florida. Surfaces are flat - no need to change gears. I haven't biked for years and bought two for both my husband and myself. I feel like a kid again. Best thing I've bought in years! We are having a GREAT time with them!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Only riding one time, the petal in the center ...
customer_reviews.text: Only riding one time, the petal in the center was dropped, the bolt thread was ruined. No parts are available even contact pacific cycle. Is that life time warranted ?
customer_reviews.author: buyer!

customer_reviews.title: great lil bike
customer_reviews.text: I use this bike to scoot around the french quarter, it's great for Zipping from a to b to c without the bulkiness of a regular size bike.
customer_reviews.author: brian colvay

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this product and opened the box and noticed the seat was missing. This is the first time this has ever happened. Does anyone know what I need to do to get that missing part?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rivas

customer_reviews.title: An alternative to a Dahon
customer_reviews.text: Although not as light or well built as a Dahon (Broadwalk model), I find this bike to be a decent alternative. Fenders are made of plastic, luggage rack is convienent, nicely supplied nylon protective bag for the bike in the folded position. Front and rear hand brakes, (no coaster brakes). What I didn't like about the bike is that the crank arm is made of plastic. Although thick, it's just chromed plastic. About $40-60 less than the Dahon Broadwalk.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dong

customer_reviews.title: goog for rv
customer_reviews.text: rides good folds easy but does not fold to 11". best i could get wes 15". i think it will work well for my rv
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great bike--bought it to take south in the winter
customer_reviews.author: cathy christensen

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful!
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for a college student on the go! This was a great buy! Easy to handle and prefect for transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca V Keller

customer_reviews.title: good little bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bike, it came fully assemble just take it out the box and fill the tires with air and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Defective and broken on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: This bike arrived with a broken piece of plastic for a chain covering and the chain itself fell off instantly because it turned out that the cog it turned on was bent out of shape so there wasn't even a chance it would run. Pretty worthless and was a lot of inconvenience so I strongly recommend against buying this, especially since another reviewer had exactly the same two issues and so this is not an isolated occurrence. Rami
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Complete crap
customer_reviews.text: There used to be a time when Schwinn meant quality. Now, it's completely Wal-Martized. Don't waste your money because it will arrive in such horrible shape that it will rust in a few months time and break after a few uses. So, if you are like me and looking for a commuter bike, look else where.
customer_reviews.author: Z. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, Have not ridden as yet
customer_reviews.text: Assembled, Great feel, Have not ridden as yet. Need slight air in rear tire. Quick delivery perfect condition ,no problems. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: My new bike awesome😀😁
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike and am happy I did. Been riding and loving it. I can fit it in my Jeep without folding it. Thanks for a great bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Remillard

customer_reviews.title: I think it will work out.
customer_reviews.text: The product was good, I like Schwinn. In this case, the bike arrived damaged with the sprocket badly bent and the chain and chain guard broken off. My husband fixed the sprocket, so the bike is ridable. This was easier than sending it back. The box it came in was not broken, so I do not know when it became damaged. I probably would have given a better review if it arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mousesmom

product_meta.title: Schwinn Hinge Folding Bike, Great for Urban Riding and Commuting, Featuring Low Step-Through Steel Frame, Single-Speed Drivetrain, Front and Rear Fenders, Rear Rack, Carrying Bag, and 20-Inch Wheels
feature_bullets: The Schwinn Hinge folding bike is designed to fit a wide range of riders with a suggested maximum rider weight of 220 pounds. Ditch headache-inducing traffic and bike to work with this convenient single-speed folding bike

With a sturdy steel frame, 20-inch alloy wheels, and a convenient folding system, the Schwinn Hinge is easy to carry, easy to fold, and easy to store. Includes one folding pedal and one regular pedal for easier storage and folds down to 30"x32"x11"
Commuting with the Schwinn Hinge folding bike is quick and easy with the 1-speed drivetrain that allows you to coast when you need a break
The Schwinn Hinge folding bike comes with full-wrap fenders to keep you clean and dry while riding and the included rear carrying rack is perfect for your work bag.Pedals:Resin platform w/ reflector
This bike comes ready to be assembled, includes a thick nylon storage bag, and is perfect for urban commuters and city riders. Comes with Schwinn's Limited Lifetime Warranty
